title: Lou Holtz tells stories from his coaching days & discusses how to build a championship culture
itunes:title: Lou Holtz tells stories from his coaching days & discusses how to build a championship culture
description:
DJ and Bucky are back with a special new episode. The guys talk with college football coaching legend Lou Holtz on this podcast (1:47). Holtz talks about how to build a championship culture, lists coaches who have coached under him, tells multiple stories from his coaching days that you won’t want to miss and explains why wide receiver Randy Moss was the best high school player he's ever seen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
